title: Create initial youth organization app (landing + basic pages)

requirements.text: Create a responsive, multi-page frontend scaffold for a youth organization app with a top navigation and the following pages: Home, About, Programs, Events, Contact.

quotes: An app for a youth organization

acceptanceCriteria: App loads successfully from the template and shows a consistent top navigation on all pages.
Each page renders distinct placeholder content in English that can be edited later.
Navigation works without full page reloads.
Layout is mobile-first and remains usable on common breakpoints (mobile/tablet/desktop).

requirements.text: Apply a coherent visual theme appropriate for a youth organization (colors, typography, spacing, components) and use it consistently across all pages.

quotes: An app for a youth organization

acceptanceCriteria: Theme is consistent across pages (buttons, headings, cards, links).
Theme does not use a blue/purple primary palette.

requirements.text: Add a Home page hero section that uses a generated hero image and includes an English headline and short description suitable for a youth organization.

quotes: An app for a youth organization

acceptanceCriteria: Home page displays the hero image from frontend/public/assets/generated.
Hero includes an English headline and supporting text.
Hero section remains readable and well-laid-out on mobile.

requirements.text: Add generated static image assets to the project under frontend/public/assets/generated and render them in the UI where appropriate (e.g., hero and logo).

quotes: An app for a youth organization

acceptanceCriteria: Generated images exist in frontend/public/assets/generated with the specified filenames.
At least the logo and hero image are displayed in the UI.
No backend is used to serve or transform these images.

constraints: Use English for all user-facing text.
Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Keep backend changes minimal unless required; do not introduce additional backend services beyond the single Motoko actor.
nonGoals: External integrations (social media APIs, maps, email providers).

required: Friendly youth-organization logo mark, flat vector style (youth-logo.dim_512x512.png)
Warm, energetic hero banner illustration/photo-collage style with diverse youths, no text (youth-hero.dim_1600x900.png)
Small set of 3 simple flat icons representing activities/learning/community (youth-icons.dim_768x256.png)

preferencesToAdd: Use English for all user-facing text.
